org.trianacode.gui.panels

Class FormLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.panels.FormLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager

    public class FormLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager
    A layout manager for laying-out components in a form. It works like a Grid layout with 2 columns except the height of each row is independent.
